title: Perseverance
description:
Chris Redd, Erin Barker, and Ernest Anfin share stories about running from the cops, vaginal problem solving, and a custody battle.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Handsome and Gretyl, Kevin Allison, Ernest Anfin, Jeff Barr, Fruit Bats, Erin Barker, The New Mastersounds, Don Nelson, Chris Redd)
